short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Extension to make a custom Hulu profile picture. Personalize your user account and choose your own profile icon.
short.de: Erweiterung zum Erstellen eines benutzerdefinierten Hulu-Profilbilds. Personalisieren Sie Ihr Benutzerkonto und wählen Sie Ihr…
short.es: Extensión para crear una foto de perfil personalizada de Hulu. Personaliza tu cuenta de usuario y elige tu propio icono de perfil.
short.fr: Extension pour créer une photo de profil Hulu personnalisée. Personnalisez votre compte utilisateur et choisissez votre propre…
short.pl: Rozszerzenie umożliwiające utworzenie niestandardowego zdjęcia profilowego Hulu. Spersonalizuj swoje konto użytkownika i wybierz…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nowadays you can customize almost everything, so why not Hulu profile picture? 
If you’re bored with the limited options available on Hulu this extension is for you!

Make your avatar stand out by uploading a picture of your choice. Whether it’s your selfie, cute photo of your pet, or your favorite band’s logo, now you can individualize your profile even more. Add some personal touch to your watching experience.

How does it work?

1. Add the MyPicture for Hulu extension to your browser
2. Log to your Hulu account and go to Manage Profiles screen 
3. From extensions pop-up menu choose the the profile you want to the picture changed
4. Choose a picture to use as your avatar. Use a square one for the best result. 

Make your profile more distinctive and 100% personalized. It's as simple as that!

Please note: the extension will only modify the profile picture on the device it is installed on. This means your new picture won't be visible on smart TVs or smartphones. Also you have to go through Manage Profiles screen in order to load profile names.

Disclaimer : Hulu is a trademark of Disney Media and Entertainment Distribution. This website & extension hold no association or affiliation with Hulu or any third-party companies.
